Class BaseTest

java.lang.Object
com.ltts.ExtentReporterNG
com.ltts.BaseTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
TestNgFile
public class BaseTest
extends ExtentReporterNG
BaseTest class has methods to setup Thread safe WebDriver of selected browser.
